tweet: Black and minority farmers are facing extinction in the United States. The latest COVID relief bill is trying to change that.  Here is a history lesson on racism in the agriculture industry.  https://t.co/L0stFmQx65
name: The Recount

tweet: "The principal danger of private farmland owners like Bill Gates is not their professed support of sustainable agriculture often found in philanthropic work – it’s the monopolistic role they play in determining our food systems and land use patterns."   https://t.co/zVibexgzUM
name: Shailja Patel
